nodes.text: The Galactic Empire had a supply base on the Jade Moon. The hub was protected by a DSS-02 deflector shield generator, with the generator in a nearby canyon. Another building held advanced shield technology. A squadron of TIEs was available for defense, and XX-9 heavy turbolasers and missile turrets were spread around the hub. More than six months after the Battle of Yavin, the Imperial defector Kasan Moor led the Rebel Alliance's flight group Rogue Squadron to raid the supply hub.
Rogue Leader Luke Skywalker destroyed the building which held the shield technology and acquired the technology.
After Skywalker destroyed the shield generator, the Rebel's combat vehicles raided the hub for its supplies.
The supply base appears in the 1998 video game Star Wars: Rogue Squadron. Acquiring the technology is necessary for the mission's gold medal, and this article assumes the player did so.
